oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On universal knot polynomials
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mironov, A.
Mkrtchyan, R.
Morozov, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
Mathematics - Geometric Topology
Mathematics - Quantum Algebra
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a universal knot polynomials for 2- and 3-strand torus knots in adjoint representation, by universalization of appropriate Rosso-Jones formula. According to universality, these polynomials coincide with adjoined colored HOMFLY and Kauffman polynomials at SL and SO/Sp lines on Vogel's plane, and give their exceptional group's counterparts on exceptional line. We demonstrate that [m,n]=[n,m] topological invariance, when applicable, take place on the entire Vogel's plane. We also suggest the universal form of invariant of figure eight knot in adjoint representation, and suggest existence of such universalization for any knot in adjoint and its descendant representation. Properties of universal polynomials and applications of these results are discussed.
Comment: 26 pages, a number of misprints corrected, section 2.4 mainly sent to added Appendix B
